Package com.project.dao

Interface SignUpDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SignUpDaoImpl
    public interface SignUpDao
    This interface defines the methods that need to be implemented for carrying out basic operations for users. Contains 3 methods to insert a new user, login user to the application and read the details of a particular user.
    Author:
    Harsh Sharma

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int insertUser​(SignUpBean signUpBean)
      Method to insert a new user in the database.
      boolean loginUser​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password)
      Method to check if the user with given details exists in the database or not.
      SignUpBean readUserDetails​(java.lang.String userName)
      Method to read or retrieve all the user details for a particular user name.

    • Method Detail

      • insertUser

        int insertUser​(SignUpBean signUpBean)
        throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
               java.sql.SQLException
        Method to insert a new user in the database. It takes a SignUpBean object as a parameter that contains the details regarding the user. It returns an integer if the insertion was successful or not.
        Parameters:
        signUpBean - A object of SignUpBean class.
        Returns:
        int The result after insertion i.e., 1 or 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the requested class is not found in the class path.
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws when an error occurs due to any wrong implementation of a SQL query or any database calls.

      • loginUser

        boolean loginUser​(java.lang.String userName,
                  java.lang.String password)
           throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                  java.sql.SQLException
        Method to check if the user with given details exists in the database or not. If the user exists, the method return true and if not then it returns false. Thus it gives a functionality of login and checking user credentials.
        Parameters:
        userName - A String that holds the user's user name.
        password - A String that holds the user's password.
        Returns:
        boolean True if user exists and false if the user doesn't exist in the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the requested class is not found in the class path.
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws when an error occurs due to any wrong implementation of a SQL query or any database calls.

      • readUserDetails

        SignUpBean readUserDetails​(java.lang.String userName)
                    throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                           java.sql.SQLException
        Method to read or retrieve all the user details for a particular user name. The user details as a object corresponding to a particular user name are fetched from the database and returned.
        Parameters:
        userName - Holds the name of the user whose details are to be fetched.
        Returns:
        SignUpBean An Object of SignUpBean.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the requested class is not found in the class path.
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws when an error occurs due to any wrong implementation of a SQL query or any database calls.
